original_text: and the boat was already a considerable distance from land, buffeted by the waves because the wind was against it.
korean_text: 배가 이미 육지에서 수 리나 떠나서 바람이 거스르므로 물결로 말미암아 고난을 당하더라

sentences.original_text: the boat was already a considerable distance from land
sentences.korean_translation: 배는 이미 땅에서 상당한 거리에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: because the wind was against it
